# UISearchBar.Icon.clear

**Case**

Identifies the clear action icon.

## Declaration

```swift
case clear
```

## Discussion

By default, the corresponding icon is a circle containing an X.

## Constants

- **UISearchBar.Icon.search**: Identifies the search icon.
- **UISearchBar.Icon.bookmark**: Identifies the bookmarks icon.
- **UISearchBar.Icon.resultsList**: Identifies the results list icon.
title: UISearchBar.Icon.clear
